ExtraÂ¶

The ioc package include some integration with some python libs, just edit the config.yml file and add the different following yaml sections.

  • Event Dispatcher
    • Configuration
  • Flask
    • Configuration
    • Services available
  • Mailer
    • Configuration
  • Redis-Py
    • Configuration
    • Services available
  • redis_wrap
    • Configuration
  • Twisted
    • Configuration
    • Services available
